Activity: Log in to the EHR system and review any new updates or system messages. Check emails for urgent communications from colleagues or supervisors.
Quick huddle with @rn-3, @itpm-1, and @da-2 to discuss project progress and potential roadblocks. Share any updates on patient data collection and vaccination efforts.

Start with patient assessments, emphasizing thorough data entry into the EHR. Make sure that all the relevant information is captured, including patient demographics, medical history, and current medications.
Administer influenza vaccinations to scheduled patients in the morning. Answer their questions and make them feel at ease regarding the vaccine safety. Document all the vaccination details.
Lunch Break - Play board games at the cafeteria with @helpdesk-1 and @rn-2
Continue patient assessments, and make sure you enter data into the EHR. Focus on identifying risks and working on the risks. Collaborate with the healthcare staff as needed.
Administer influenza vaccinations during the afternoon clinic, and document them into EHR system.
Review patient charts for completeness, and prepare for the handover notes.
Respond to emails, and prepare for the next shift.
